https://tmrev.io/movie/526313-A Leaf of Faith 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yBR1TbSZ2Y4nkBj85q07OgY9L03.jpg Documentary exploring a plant-based alternative to Opioid painkillers, which are responsible for the deaths of 30,000 Americans a year. It comes from a tree named Kratom, and it is able to alleviate pain and help overcome addiction without many of the side effects of Opioids. A Leaf of Faith
